import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import '../styles/input.css' const Table = () => { const [posts, setPosts] = useState([]) const getPosts = async () => { await fetch('https://localhost:7157/get-posts', { method: 'GET', mode: 'cors', headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' } }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data); setPosts([...posts, data]) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } useEffect(() => { getPosts(); console.log(posts); },[]) return (

Posts

{item.id} {item.name} {item.description}

) } export default Table;
